entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain mixed with snow in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 22 January 2023
